Articles.Content: Just out of curiosity, how long would it take Jebediah Kerman to walk the circumference (at the equator) of the Mun?

~174 hours, a hair over a week straight. IIRC walking speed is around 2m/sec on the mun and the equitorial radius is 200,000m for the Mun. Circumfrence is pi*r*2 and then divide by walking speed. It is a long time.
